original_title: Vivir para dibujar, Dibujar para vivir
overview: Can spanish comic artists live from their work?  With the testimony of illustrators, screenwriters, editors, teachers and booksellers will try to offer an accurate picture of this profession.  With these experiences we aim to provide a broad spectrum of the profession: from the amateur that seeks up to "the league" to the problems that can arise within a publication / publishing.
title: Vivir para dibujar, Dibujar para vivir
